ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: ANY bard that is wasting a song slot to sing this should be booted. Get a cold stone, get a DE mask (I know level 3 bards with this), get a glowing stone band,
ygData.messageBody:
ANY bard that is wasting a song slot to sing this should be booted. Get a
cold stone, get a DE mask (I know level 3 bards with this), get a glowing
stone band, get a caster to cast ultra vision on you. WHATEVER. This song is
useless, and to try to justify it by saying that there are a few select uses
for it is being argumentative.

This song rates up there with Denon's Desperate Dirge, Melody of Ervaj and
Solon's Charismatic Concord.

Draelon Stormsong
Troubador of Karana
Tribunal Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 1:20 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


At 12:59 PM 2/27/01 -0500, you wrote:
>i have never used concord once. never. it is useless.

that would have been a correct statement if you had added ''to me'' at the
end of ''it is useless''. if you were a human bard without a dark elf mask,
i believe you would find it very useful.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.

Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
